Launcher.summary: This is the launcher of the program, contains the Main() method. Opens and writes the user's inputs to the file. Also, displays file's current contents.

remarks.para: This class will hold the file name the user inputted.
This class will also write the following user inputs to the file...

item.description: The saved inputted data of user's first name, then last name.
The sum and product of both integer the user inputted.
